column1: crush ca. 3g of representative subsample in mortar
add crushed subsample in ceramic beaker and weigh again
cool down in glass bowl with hygroscopic material in bottom (Name? Ask Mufak)
cool down in glass bowl with hygroscopic material in bottom (Desiccator)
After dried overnight at 105°C weight again
Cooled down in desiccator to avoid hydration from atm-H2O

column7: Loss drying at 105°C = Loss water bc previous dried at 60°C

column1: Sample transferred in oven at 550°C for 3h
Sample cooled down in desiccator overnight

column7: Loss drying at 550°C for 3h relative to weight after drying at 105°C overnight = LOI
